sentences: Naftat ammutatakse igal aastal sadu miljoneid tonne.
Kogu tema t체se keha n채ib enesele jalgealusest maast eluj천udu ammutavat.
context: The word 'miljoneid' is the partitive plural form of 'miljon' (million) in Estonian. It's used to express an indefinite large quantity or a number in the millions, typically following a numeral or when referring to approximately millions of something. In the provided examples, it appears in contexts describing extraction quantities like 'sadu miljoneid tonne' (hundreds of millions of tons), indicating massive amounts of natural resources being extracted.
